data.title: Anime 16:Kirarin Revolution
data.meta_description: Read Anime 16:Kirarin Revolution from the story Anime Recommendations ^_^ by angelazhushugo (~Kawaii~) with 125 reads. anime, recomendations. Genre:Comedy,Roma...
data.text:
Genre:Comedy,Romance,Drama,

Shoujo

Summary:

Tsukishima Kirari is a cute 14 year old girl first did not care about idols and the entertainment world and her obsession with food brought her to be clueless about love.

One day,she saved a turtle that was stuck on a tree and meets a boy named Seiji who gives her a concert ticket to see SHIPS,a popular idol unit for saving his turtle.Kirari went to the concert and meets another boy who tears up her ticket,saying that she and Seiji lived in different worlds and she shouldn't be seeing him.Frustrated,Kirari sneaks backstage and found out that Seiji and the boy who tore up her ticket,Hiroto were the members of SHIPS.

Kirari understood that Seiji was an idol,and she was just a normal high school girl.In order to get closer to Seiji,Kirari demands that she wants to be and idol.

I really love this anime there is 115 episodes and I'm up to 8o something..
